member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.Node`2
member.summary: Represents a node in a (binary) tree.
member.typeparam: The key of the node as generic type.
The payload of the node as generic type.

member.name: P:Fusee.Jometri.Node`2.Key
member.summary: The key of the node - determines how a node is sorted into the tree.

member.name: P:Fusee.Jometri.Node`2.Value
member.summary: The payload of the node.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.Node`2.LeftNode
member.summary: An item with lower value than the value of this node will become a LeftNode.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.Node`2.RightNode
member.summary: An item with higher value than the value of this node will become a RightNode.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.Node`2.#ctor(`0,`1)
member.summary: Constructor, creates a new node.
member.param: The key of the new node.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2
member.summary: Data structure that stores items and allows fast lookup, insertion and deletion.
member.typeparam: The type of the tree's key.
The type of the tree's value.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2._globalRoot
member.summary: The root node of the tree.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.InsertNode(`0,`1)
member.summary: Inserts a new node in a existing tree.
member.param: Value of the node to be inserted into the tree.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.PreorderTraverseTreeKeys
member.summary: Preorder traversal of the tree. Visits the root, then visits the left sub-tree, after that visits the right sub-tree. Returns the keys.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.PreorderTraverseTreeValues
member.summary: Preorder traversal of the tree. Visits the root, then visits the left sub-tree, after that visits the right sub-tree. Returns the values.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.InOrderTraverseTree
member.summary: Inorder traversal of the tree.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.DeleteNode(`0)
member.summary: Deletes a node from the tree.
member.param: Key of the node which is to be deleted.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.FindNode(`0)
member.summary: Traverses the tree to find and return a node with a certain value.
member.param: The key to be searched for.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.FindMin
member.summary: Returns the minimum value in the tree.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.FindMin(Fusee.Jometri.Node{`0,`1})
member.summary: Returns the minimum value in the tree, starting at the given node.
member.param: The node at which to start the search.
member.returns: The node containing the minimum value.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.BalanceTree
member.summary: Balances a given tree.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.BinarySearchTree`2.FindLargestSmallerThanInBalanced(`0)
member.summary: Finds the value of a node whose key is the largest, smaller than the given. Only works with a balanced tree. It may be necessary to call BalanceTree before this method.
member.param: The key that is used as search parameter.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.CreatePrimitiveGeometry
member.summary: This class provides public methods to create primitive geometry from scratch. The Geometry is stored in DCEL

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.CreatePrimitiveGeometry.CreateCuboidGeometry(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates and returns a Cuboid as DCEL with the given dimensions, centered in the world coordinate system.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.CreatePrimitiveGeometry.CreateSpehreGeometry(System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates and returns a UV-Sphere as a DCEL with the specified dimensions centered in the worlds coordinate system.
member.param: Lines of latitude, smallest value is 3.
Lines of longitude, smallest value is 3.
member.returns: A UV-Sphere centered in the world coordinate system as a DCEL.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.CreatePrimitiveGeometry.CreateConeGeometry(System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates and returns a cone with the given dimensions.
member.param: The radius of the base circle.
The horizontal resolution of the base circle. Min value is 3. For a basic cone 15.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.CreatePrimitiveGeometry.CreatePyramidGeometry(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates and returns a Pyramid as a DCEL with the specified dimensions centered in the worlds coordinate system.
member.param: Width of the Pyramid in X-dimension
Height of the Pyramid in Y-dimension.
Depth of the Pyramid in Z-dimension.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.Extrude
member.summary: Provides extrusion functionality for geometries.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.Extrude.Extrude2DPolygon(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extrudes a complete planar geometry.
member.param: zOffset will be used to create the new vertices.
Pass 'true' if you want do extrude the polygon along its normal and 'false' if you want to extrude along the worlds z axis.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.HalfEdge

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.Face
member.summary: Each face belonging to a 2D geometry contains: a handle to assign a abstract reference to it. a reference to one of the half edges that belongs to the faces outer boundary. a List that contains handles to one half edge for each hole in a face. attribute information, e.g. the face normal. Note that unbounded faces can't have a OuterHalfEdge but must have at least one InnerHalfEdge - bounded faces must have a OuterComponent.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.Face.Handle
member.summary: The reference of the Face.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.Face.OuterHalfEdge
member.summary: A reference to one of the half edges that belongs to the Face's outer boundary.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.Face.FaceData
member.summary: Attribute information, e.g. the face normals.

member.summary: Constructor for creating a new Face.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.GeomEditing
member.summary: Provides methods to edit the components of a geometry.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeomEditing.InsertVertex(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,System.Int32,System.Int32,Fusee.Math.Core.float3)
member.summary: Inserts a new Vertex between two given existing Vertices.
member.param: The Geometry to insert a Vertex.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeomEditing.InsertDiagonal(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a pair of HalfEdges between two (non adjacent) vertices of a Face.
member.param: The Geometry to insert a diagonal.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeomEditing.InsetFace(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Insets a Face with a given offset. The new, center Face has the same Handle as the original Face.
member.param: The geometry on which to perform a face inset.
The Handle of the face, the new one will be inserted to.
The offset of the inset in percent. Use values between 0 and 1. A value of 0.5f means 50% of the original face remains.
member.returns: Returns the geometry with edited faces.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations
member.summary: Provides methods to perform geometric operations.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.Reduce2D(Fusee.Math.Core.float3,Fusee.Math.Core.float3)
member.summary: Calculates the vertex position so that it is parallel to the x-y plane.
member.param: The normal of the polygon the vertex belongs to. Used as new Z axis.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.CalculateFaceNormal(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fusee.Jometri.Vertex})
member.summary: Calculates a face normal from three vertices. The vertices have to be coplanar and part of the face.
member.param: All vertices of the outer boundary of the face.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsPointInPolygon(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,Fusee.Jometri.Face,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex)
member.summary: Tests if a point/vertex lies inside or outside a face - only works for polygons parallel to a plane!
member.param: The geometry the polygon (here: face) belongs to.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsPointInPolygon(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,Fusee.Jometri.Face,Fusee.Math.Core.float3)
member.summary: Tests if a point/vertex lies inside or outside a face - Only use this if you know the face AND vertex lie in the same plane and this plane is parallel to xy or xz or yz!
member.param: The geometry the polygon (here: face) belongs to.
The faces to be tested. It will not be Reduced2D!

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsAngleGreaterPi(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,Fusee.Jometri.Face,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex)
member.summary: Determines whether the angle between two vectors formed by three vertices is greater than 180 °. The first vector will be created from v1 and v2, the second from v2 and v3.
member.param: The geometry the vertices belong to.
The face the vertices belong to.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsAngleGreaterOrEqualPi(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,Fusee.Jometri.Face,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex,Fusee.Jometri.Vertex)
member.summary: Determines if the angle between two vectors, formed by three vertices, is greater or equal 180°. The first vector will be created from v1 and v2, the second from v2 and v3.
member.param: The geometry the vertices belong to.
The face the vertices belong to.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsVertexAdjacentToVertex(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,System.Int32,System.Int32,Fusee.Jometri.HalfEdge,Fusee.Jometri.HalfEdge)
member.summary: Tests if a vertex is a direct neighbor of an other vertex. Only use this method if you know the incident half edges of the vertex.
member.param: The geometry the vertex belongs to.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.GetHalfEdgesWChangedWinding(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Fusee.Jometri.HalfEdge})
member.summary: Returns the half edges from a source collection of half edges - with opposite direction.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsCounterClockwise(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fusee.Math.Core.float3})
member.summary: Checks whether a polygon, parallel to the xy plane, has a ccw winding. This method does NOT support polygons parallel to the yz or xz plane! To guarantee a correct output make sure the polygon doesn't degenerate when the z coordinates are ignored.
member.param: The polygon, represented as list of float3s.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.IsLineIntersectingLine(Fusee.Math.Core.float3,Fusee.Math.Core.float3,Fusee.Math.Core.float3,Fusee.Math.Core.float3,Fusee.Math.Core.float3@)
member.summary: Checks if two lines intersect.
member.param: First control point of the first line.
Second control point of the first line.
First point of the second line.
Second point of the second line.
The intersection point, if the lines do not intersect this will be float3 Infinity.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.GeometricOperations.GetVerticesMeanPos(System.Collections.Generic.List{Fusee.Jometri.Vertex})
member.summary: Calculates the mean Vertex position of given Vertices.
member.param: List of all Vertices which are part of the new mean position.
member.returns: Returns the position of the mean of all Vertices as a float3.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.PolyBoundary
member.summary: Represents an outer or inner boundary of a polygon.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.PolyBoundary.Points
member.summary: The geometric information of the vertices which belong to a boundary.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.PolyBoundary.IsOuter
member.summary: Determines whether a boundary is a outer boundary or a inner boundary (which forms a hole in the face).

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.GeomInitializeHelper
member.summary: Helper class for initializing Geometry objects.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.GeomInitializeHelper.BoundaryEdge
member.summary: Used in the initialization process of a new Geometry. A BoundaryEdge contains one edge of the boundary and the information whether the source vertex of the half edge (not the twin half edge) is already part of the Geometry.

summary.para: The types in this module implement geometry manipulation functionality.

Geometry manipulation algorithms need to quickly access information about a geometry's topology including queries such as "Which edges are connected to a vertex", "Retrieve all vertices for a given polygon", "Retrieve all adjacent polygons".

The main type provided in this module is internally keeping geometry data in a data structure called DECL (doubly connected (half) edge list) allows for such queries. Additionally, a number of geometric algorithms are implemented here.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.SubdivisionSurface
member.summary: Provides functionality to perform a Catmull-Clark Subdivision-Surface algorithm on a Geometry.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.SubdivisionSurface.CatmullClarkSubdivision(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry)
member.summary: Performs a Catmull-Clark Subdivision-Surface algorithm on a given geometry which is stored as DCEL.
member.param: The geometry to perform the SD on.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.Triangulation
member.summary: Contains the triangulation of a geometry, stored in half edge data structure.

member.name: M:Fusee.Jometri.Triangulation.Triangulate(Fusee.Jometri.Geometry)
member.summary: After triangulation all faces of a geometry consist of three vertices and three half edges.

member.name: T:Fusee.Jometri.VertexType
member.summary: To divide a polygon into y monotone pieces, the corners of this polygon must be divided into different categories. Those are start, end, split, merge, and regular vertices.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.VertexType.StartVertex
member.summary: A vertex is a start vertex in case his two neighbors are below him and the interior angle between the two adjacent edges is smaller than pi.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.VertexType.EndVertex
member.summary: A vertex is a end vertex in case his two neighbors are above him and the interior angle between the two adjacent edges is smaller than pi.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.VertexType.SplitVertex
member.summary: A vertex is a split vertex in case his two neighbors are below him and the interior angle between the two adjacent edges is greater than pi.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.VertexType.MergeVertex
member.summary: A vertex is a merge vertex in case his two neighbors are above him and the interior angle between the two adjacent edges is greater than pi.

member.name: F:Fusee.Jometri.VertexType.RegularVertex
member.summary: A vertex is a regular vertex in case his two neighbors and the adjacent edges do not meet one of the conditions defining the other types.
